title: Slow cooker rustic lamb shanks
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '12 shallots, roughly chopped', '3 cloves garlic, minced', '1 sprig rosemary, chopped', '2 large lamb shanks', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '2 tablespoons plain flour', '55g salted butter', '3 carrots, peeled and chopped', '2 sticks celery, roughly chopped', '4 potatoes, peeled and diced', '1 (400g) tin chopped tomatoes', '1/2 bottle red wine', '300ml vegetable stock', '1 bouquet garni', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley']
